title: Abandoned Cart Follow-Up
description: An automated system identifies a customer who abandoned a cart with high-value items. An agent needs to send a follow-up email.

tasks.description: Retrieve the details of the abandoned cart, including the items and customer email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the list of items and customer contact info.

tasks.description: Generate a unique 10% discount code for the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a single-use discount code.

tasks.description: Send a personalized email to the customer reminding them of their cart and including the discount code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a correctly formatted and personalized recovery email.
